resources.string: Based in Johannesburg, Steyn Entertainment is a global multi-disciplinary organization committed to developing and connecting Africa to the rest of the world, in the arts and entertainment arenas.\n\n Our current dynamically diverse portfolio includes record label and management company STAY LOW, global music festival ROCKING THE DAISIES, leading creative and entrepreneurial hub MARKET UP, and inner- city art hotel HALLMARK HOUSE, along with its unique in-house offerings MARABI CLUB, THORN, CUTTERS and ROOFTOP at HALLMARK venue.

In The City was established in 2012 and has evolved over the 
the years into more than just a music festival. It is the 
cultural intersection where street culture, inclusivity, self
expression and good vibes meet.

No matter how different we are from each other, there is a rhythm that unifies us. It is in the neighbourhood hadeda alarm clock that we all love to hate it’s in the sounds of the ever-bustling streets, and the roaring laughter and chatter that comes from our pubs, clubs and shebeens.

 Music has the ability to unify people from all walks of life. was established in 2012 and has evolved over the years into more than just a music festival. It is the cultural intersection where street culture, inclusivity, self-expression and good vibes meet and after an unprecedented hiatus, is finally BACK!!! . . . but with a twist!

 In The City is no longer a strictly Johannesburg based festival and instead will be expanded into the rest of South Africa and beyond. Our aim is to provide music lovers with an immersive music and cultural experience. Each event will represent a different genre of music which will be dictated by the selected International headliner.

Reflecting the present and curating the future, Steyn Entertainment – the company behind Rocking the Daisies – is committed to developing, supporting and cultivating quality, multi-sensory cultural experiences, in the interest of maintaining that R100-laundry type joy through music and love.
Looking to start a project? Let us know how we can help you
Steyn Entertainment organizes major music festivals in South Africa like Rocking the Daisies and In the City. These festivals bring together popular musicians, artists, and attendees.
Steyn Entertainment operates a record label and artist management company called Stay Low that represents South African musical talent.
Steyn Entertainment owns and operates Hallmark House, an art hotel in Johannesburg. Hallmark House includes venues like the Marabi Jazz Club.
Steyn Entertainment has an in-house creative and marketing agency that provides branding, content, and campaigns for clients.
The founders have investment companies focused on real estate, private equity, venture capital, healthcare, education technology, and more.
